excerpt: A delicious vegan version of the classic pasta dish with fresh basil pesto.

instructions.name: Make the Pesto
instructions: Add the basil, garlic, pine nuts, and salt and pepper to a food processor and pulse until finely chopped.
Slowly drizzle in the olive oil while the food processor is running until the pesto is smooth.
Add lemon juice and pulse for a few more seconds. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.

instructions.name: Cook the Pasta
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup of pasta water before draining the pasta.
Transfer the pasta to a large bowl. Add the pesto and toss until the pasta is well coated. If the pasta is too dry, add a splash of pasta water at a time until desired consistency is reached.
